title: Via Roma Pizza and Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Italian, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. By the Stop & Shop, the menu here includes traditional Italian cuisine as well as gluten free and vegetarian alternatives. Has vegan cheese alternative - for lasagna, rollantini, stuffed mushroom, baked ziti, and other dishes. Reported has vegan and gluten-free desserts (need call to confirm). Accept special orders for vegan cakes.
